column1: begins with a ball pitched on a short of good length on the leg and middle. Zhuwao gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it

fuller ball outside the off stump. Murtagh might have thought that Zhuwao would take his time to get his eye in and treat good deliveries with respect. Nothing of that from Zhuwao as he comes onto the frontfoot and lofts it high over long-on for a six
outside off and left alone
short outside the off stump. Zhuwao defends it to the off side
on the top of the off stump and short in length. Zhuwao defends it to the off side
not anymore as he short-arm pulls it to long-on for a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Zhuwao lets it go

Zhuwao is moving away as the delivery was being bowled because he wanted some room to go on the off side, but for some reason he pulls out of it at the last moment. It was a short ball outside the off stump
short ball outside the off stump. Zhuwao does what he wanted to do off the previous ball: take the frontfoot away and slam it over long-off for a boundary
good length ball on the leg stump. He glances it to short fine-leg
beaten by the slower ball outside the off stump. He wanted to clear the long-off once again. The one he cleared long-off with, early in the over, was 131 kmph and this was 109 kmph
beaten by the slower ball again! This time it's 113 kmph and he brings the bat down early. He adjusts late and defends it
defends it to the off side
defends it to the leg side
good length ball on the leg stump. He was looking to flick it, but gets a leading edge to mid-on for a single to get off the mark

short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Zhuwao is pretty sure that he would be attacked with this length. So, he makes room and gives himself the freedom to go either side. He pulls this over midwicket. There is a lot of power in the stroke
slower and shorter outside the off stump. Zhuwao drives it to sweeper cover and gets himself three runs
good length ball outside the off stump. Mire comes forward and defends
good length delivery and slower in pace 110 kmph. Zhuwao swings blindly and misses. Now to get that in line with the stumps
111 kmph outside the off stump. Zhuwao is drawn into the stroke early, again, as he drives and misses
short delivery on the leg stump. Much quicker in pace this one 133 kmph and Zhuwao ducks under it

the Zhuwao show has ended ! He seemed troubled by McCarthy's slower deliveries. He perishes to another slower delivery as he has made up his mind to play a shot, regardless. The ball in on the off stump line and Zhuwao lofts it right into the outstretched hands of Rankin at long-on. Good bowling by McCarthy
full-toss outside the off stump. Chance to free the arms and that's what Masakadza does as he drives it past cover for three runs
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
good length ball outside the off stump and slower in pace (118 kmph). Masakadza is deceived, but adjusts late and defends it to the off side
comes forward and punches it to point
width outside the off stump. Masakadza is deceived again by the slower ball but wants to go through with the drive as he chips it past the bowler and mid-off for a boundary
slower ball (119 kmph) just outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and defends it to the off side
fuller ball outside the off stump. He jams it out to mid-off
down the leg stump line and umpires are tough on anything with that line. It's called a wide
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He moves across and defends it to the off side
short ball outside the off stump and ditches the slower ball that was working well for him. Mire gets the pace that he was looking for and pulls it over midwicket for a six
defends it to the off side
slower ball on the off stump line (113 kmph). Mire spots it but doesn't quite get the width. So, he defends it
comes forward and defends it to mid-on. Rotates the strike with a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He closes the face of the bat early and gets an outside edge to third-man for a single
fuller and wide outside the off stump. Masakadza moves across and looks to scoop it. Beaten by the pace
comes forward and defends it to the off side
good length ball outside the off stump. He moves back and cuts it to sweeper cover for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. Mire slogs it across the line and just evades midwicket's fingertips as he gets himself a couple
short outside the off stump. He moves across and shoulders arms
short delivery outside the off stump. He gets on top of the bounce and defends it to the off side
fuller ball on the off and middle. He whips past mid-on for a boundary. Masakadza is slowly coming into his own
short ball outside the off stump. He cuts it to deep point for a couple
comes forward and defends it to the off side
good length ball on the middle and leg. Masakadza flicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
fuller ball outside the off stump. He plays it with turn to long-on for a single
defends it to midwicket
drives it to long-on for a single
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler

sees him coming down the track and pushes it through faster and wider. Mire is beaten by pace and line as he looks to get some bat on the ball as he is trotting down the track. Niall O'Brien collects the ball cleanly and whips the bails off. McBrine strikes in his first over
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
defends it to the off side
good length ball outside the off stump. Masakadza moves across and  shoulders arms
short outside the off stump. Masakadza stands tall and drives it to cover

the relentless line does the trick! Short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Masakadza, till now, was looking to get behind the line of these deliveries but there seems to be a lapse in concentration as he stays rooted to the crease and looks to get some bat on the ball. The bounce that Rankin was extracting means that it takes the outside edge and the keeper gets another dismissal added to his name
flicks it to midwicket for a single
comes forward, defends it to point
drives it to mid-off for a single
comes forward and turns it to short fine-leg
outside the off stump. He plays it with the turn to deep midwicket for a single
on the off stump. Williams defends it solidly to exaggerated cries of 'Oh yeah!' from the keeper
on the leg stump. He defends it
comes forward and drives it to point
fuller ball outside the off stump. He gets behind the line and defends it back to the bowler
short ball outside the off stump. A similar delivery to the one that he bowled to Maskadza. Taylor rises with the ball and looks to steer it away. He is beaten by the bounce
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the leg stump. Not what Rankin was wanting to bowl. Taylor puts bat on it and the ball runs away past a diving Ed Joyce, at square-leg, for a boundary
turns it to fine-leg for a single
on the leg stump to Williams too. He, like Taylor, turns it behind square for a single
short outside the off stump. Williams rocks back and cuts it to sweeper cover for a single
fuller ball on the off stump. Taylor takes a step towards the ball and lofts it way over the bowler's head for a six. Superb batting this by Taylor
turns it to the leg side
punches it to long-on for a single
outside the leg stump line. He pushes it to square-leg for a single
turns it to square-leg and retains the strike with a single
comes forward and drives it to cover
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Taylor rides the bounce and defends it to the off side
fuller ball on the middle stump. He jams his bat down on it as he pushes it past mid-on for a couple
wide down the leg stump line
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to the off side
good length ball on the middle stump. Taylor is on top of it as he is looking to defend it and gets an edge onto his box
good length ball outside the off stump. He defends it back onto the pitch
on the leg stump line and short of a good length. He turns it to the leg side for a single

good length ball outside the off stump. Taylor gets behind the line of the ball and defends it to the leg side. Even though the ball hits the bat on the sticker, he was in control as he was behind the line of the delivery
under edges a pull to fine-leg for a single
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Williams drives it to mid-off where the fielder dives over the ball. Mid-on runs across and collects the ball. The batsmen run a couple
outside off and left alone
on the leg stump. He moves across and glances it to fine-leg
good length ball outside the off stump. He defends it to the off side with the open face of the bat
pushes it to long-on for a single
width outside the off stump. Taylor moves across and looks to go through cover. He is beaten
punches it to mid-on for a single
turns it to the leg side for a single

short ball outside the off stump. Williams was set up for the shot that he played - pull. He lofts it to McCarthy at deep midwicket. He didn't need to run a lot to take the catch. That's poor awareness of the match situation by Williams. When a fielder is placed for exactly that shot, one should get their eye in before thinking of clearing that fielder. Also the pace of Murtagh is such that Williams had to impart a lot of power on his own to get it over the ropes
slices him into half and sails over the stumps
defends it to the off side
struck on the front pad outside the off stump as he was looking to defend it
comes forward and defends it to the off side
outside off and left alone
glances it to short fine-leg for a single
defends it to the off side
outside off and left alone
fuller ball outside the off stump. He reaches out for the delivery and takes off one hand as he is driving to soften the impact.
steers it to  short third-man
turns it to the leg side for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. He gets behind the line of the delivery and defends
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and drives it to mid-off
short outside the off stump. Ervine stands tall and cuts it to deep point for a couple
short ball outside the off stump. He stands tall and defends it to point
defends it to the off side
comes forward and defends a fuller delivery outside the off stump
defends it to the off side
jams his bat down on a fuller delivery outside the off stump
short outside the off stump. Taylor pulls it to deep square-leg for a single
sweeps it to short fine-leg

fuller ball outside the off stump and turning this time. Taylor looks to reverse sweep and is beaten. He is struck on the hip. It might have been going down leg as he stretched out his frontfoot. The wicket leaves Zimbabwe tottering  and in need of a partnership
steers it to short third-man for a single
defends it to the off side
defends it to the off side for a single
outside off and left alone
comes behind the line of the ball and defends it to the leg side
good length ball outside the off stump. He moves across and defends it to the off side
steers it to third-man for a single
short outside the off stump. Ervine waits for the ball and guides it to third-man region for a boundary
good length ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to the off side
comes forward and defends it to mid-on
outside the off stump and turning in. Sikandar Raza makes room and lofts it to sweeper cover for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Ervine defends it to the off side
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
good length ball outside the off stump. He lets the ball come to him as he defends it back onto the pitch
good length ball outside the off stump. He gets behind the line and defends it to the off side
width given outside the off stump. Sikandar moves towards the line of the delivery and sees the ball back, all the way into the keeper's gloves
defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball on the middle stump. He flicks and gets an inside edge to midwicket
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
on the off and middle. Ervine reverse-sweeps it to third-man for a couple
comes forward and defends it to the off side
comes forward and punches it to mid-on. Porterfield overruns the ball and concedes a single where there shouldn't have been one
drives it to cover for a single
short on the midlde and leg. He makes room and wallops it over deep midwicket for a six. Ervine is looking to get a move on and trying to up the scoring rate by looking for boundaries
outside off and left alone
comes forward and defends it to the off side

good length ball outside the off stump. Sikandar is looking to defend it. The deceptive bounce, with which he got Masakadza out, is in play once again as it raises disconcertingly for Sikandar and hits him on the glove. He is in pain
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
short ball outside the off stump. Sikandar leaps and looks to cut it. The bounce beats him and the ball settles in keeper's gloves. The keeper is checking if the fielder at deep point is alert
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
punches it to long-on for a single
drives it to sweeper cover for a single
defends it to the leg side for a single
turns it to the leg side for a single

good length on the middle and leg. He defends it uncomfortably to the leg side and for some reason, they want to take a single. Maybe Sikandar is wary of Rankin after getting hit on the glove as well. Niall O'Brien runs forward and throws it to Stirling who lifts the bails off in time as Ervine was just a few millimeters away from the crease. That's poor judgement of a run by Sikandar.
comes forward and defends it to the off side
turns it to the leg side for a single
defends it to the off side for a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and left alone
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
punches it to long-on for a single
comes forward and defends it to the midwicket fielder
on the leg stump line. He turns it to square-leg
defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Sikandar forces it to mid-off for a single
on the leg stump line. He turns it to the square-leg fielder for a single
comes forward and drives it to cover

short ball and he decides to take the bowler on. He pulls it over deep midwicket for a six. He wasn't looking to keep the  ball and that clarity meant he was always looking to impart power from his side and he does it convincingly
looks to send it to Lesotho perhaps as he gets an outside edge to third-man for a boundary. Much needed runs these
defends it to the leg side
off the outside edge to short third-man
comes forward and defends it to cover
punches it to long-on for a single
guides it to point for a single and retains the strike
fuller ball outside the off stump. He doesn't get enough bat on the lofted drive he is looking to play and it trickles to the off side
good length ball outside the off stump. He steers it to third-man for a single
wide outside the off stump
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and drives it. Sikandar is backing up and has to dive back into the crease as he thought it might hit the stumps off a deflection
drives it to cover
underedges an intended steer to third-man
looks to defend it and the ball beats the outside edge
wide of the crease, holds its line on off stump, Raza bends forward and defends it back to the bowler
dragged shorter and wider outside off, slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
skids on outside off, Cremer presses forward and stabs the ball to cover
Cremer presses forward, opens the face, and drops this full ball into the vacant spaces at cover
tossed up higher outside off, Raza collapses his back leg, gets underneath the length and drills it inside-out over extra cover. Top shot from Raza
speared very full and wide outside off, he backs away and crunches a drive to the left of wide long-off
Kevin O'Brien sneaks through the defences of Cremer. He sends the leg stump cartwheeling. This was nice and full, jabs back in just enough to nip through the gate and knock out the leg stump
floated full on a fourth-stump line, defended
on a length and holds its line outside off, knocked to point off the front foot
much fuller and outside off, Chisoro plants his front leg, gets underneath the length and belts it over the bowler's head. He holds his pose like a boss
full and wide outside off, chopped away to deep point for one
comes forward and defends it to the off side
off the pads to the leg side for a leg-bye
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to the off side for a single
defends it to the off side
fuller ball outside the off stump. He drives it to long-off for a single
wide outside the off stump and coming in. He looks to defend it and the inward movement beats the bat
short ball outside the off stump. He ducks under it comfortably
short on the middle stump. He defends it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. He leans forward and defends it to the off side
good length ball on the leg stump. He defends it to  the leg side
pushes it to point and sets off for the single
comes forward and punches it to cover
good length ball outside the off stump. He waits for the ball and punches it to off side for a single
comes forward and turns it to deep midwicket for a single
fuller ball on the middle and leg. He reverse-sweeps it to short third-man
tosses it up outside the stump. Chisoro moves back and nails the drive off the backfoot to sweeper cover for a boundary
punches it to long-on for a single
down the leg stump. Chisoro gets hit on thigh pad and it runs away to fine-leg for four leg byes
defends it back to the bowler
good length ball outside the off stump. He looks to defend it and gets an inside-edge to the leg side. He has no clue about the whereabouts of the ball as he responds to Sikandar's call for a single
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
comes down the track and defends it to the off side
comes forward and defends it to the off side
short ball outside the off stump. He drives it to cover
steps down the track and defends it to the off side
short on the leg stump line. He defends it to the leg side
comes forward and punches it to cover
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball on the leg stump. He leans forward and flicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He shoulders arms
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball outside the off stump. He moves forward and drives it to sweeper cover for a couple
stands tall and defends it to point
good length ball outside the off stump and left alone by Sikandar
stands tall and defends it to point
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to cover
short ball on the leg stump. He defends it to the leg side
stands tall and drives it to long-off for a single
defends it to the off side
short ball outside the off stump. He pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
comes forward and turns it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. He drives it to sweeper cover for a single
good length ball on the middle stump. Chisoro looks to defend it on the leg side and gets an inside edge to fine-leg for a boundary
comes forward and drives it to cover
fuller  ball outside the off stump. Chisoro chases it and the slower ball beats him
short ball outside the off stump. He is looking to slice it and gets an outside edge to short third-man fielder
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
makes room and cuts it to cover
comes forward and defends it to cover
short ball outside the off stump. He spots the slower ball and pulls it to deep midwicket region for a couple
wide down the leg stump line
drives it to cover for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and drives it to cover for a single
off the outside edge to short third-man
on the leg stump line. He looks to defend it and gets hit on the pads.
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He makes room and slams it to mid-off. Sikandar is upset that he couldn't get more than a single off that slower ball.
short ball on the middle stump. He looks to pull it and is beaten
pulls it to fine-leg for a single
defends it to cover for a single
pulls it to deep square-leg for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. Slower in pace. He looks to guide it to third-man region and gets a feather back to the keeper. Chisoro is angry with himself
short and too wide outside the off stump.
drives the short ball to cover
comes forward and drives it to mid-off for a single
off the outside edge to third-man for a single

the single of last ball comes back to hurt Zimbabwe! Jarvis is moving the bat towards the ball and gets an outside edge to backward point, who has been brought in. Stirling dives to his right and takes the catch
drives it to mid-on
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller ball outside the off stump. He leans forward and drives it to mid-off
gets behind the line of the delivery on the off stump and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller ball on the stumps line. Raza lofts it to long-on to get to 49 with a boundary
comes forward and drives it to cover

short and wide outside the off stump. Raza cuts it to sweeper cover and sets off for a single. Muzarabani crosses Raza when Raza holds his hand and asks him to get back to the non-strikers end. Muzarabani, virtually ran a couple there
drills the drive back into the stumps
short ball outside the off stump. Raza pulls it to deep midwicket for a couple that gets him to his half-century
looks to cut it and misses
defends it to the off side
cuts it to deep point for a single
wide down the leg stump line
defends it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Sikandar skips down the track and goes inside out over cover for a boundary
turns it to square-leg for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. He looks to slice it away and is beaten
fuller ball on the off stump. He lofts it over long-on for a six
looks to drive and is beaten
comes forward and drives it to cover
short of a good length delivery on the off and middle. He lofts it straight back over the bowler's head for the second six of the over
fuller ball outside the off stump. He edges a slice to cover for a single
short outside the leg stump. He looks to pull it and misses. Struck on the thigh pad
looks to cut it and gets an inside edge back to the keeper. Taylor does well to hold on to the ball as he was going the other way and had to dive
wide down the leg side line
good length ball outside the off stump. He looks to defend it and is beaten by the slight away movement
looks to turn it and gets struck on the thigh pad
short ball outside the off stump. He pulls it over midwicket for a boundary
defends it back onto the pitch
defends it back to the bowler
on the leg stump line. He turns it to the leg side
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
good length ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends. Maiden over by Chisoro
outside off and left alone
comes forward and punches a good length delivery to mid-on
down the leg stump line. He flicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
overpitches on the middle stump. He turns it to deep midwicket for a single
wide outside the off stump and on a good length. He comes forward and mistimes a drive to cover
fuller ball outside the off stump. He goes inside out to sweeper cover. The ball stops dead before the boundary rope but Mire mimics pulling the ball back in
comes forward and steers it to short third-man for a single

and that's the first wicket! Short ball on the middle stump. Porterfield doesn't account for Chisoro's pace. He is faster than an average left arm spinner and looks to pull. All he does is guide it into the hands of Sikandar Raza at short midwicket
drives it to cover
defends it to cover
good length ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and drives it to sweeper cover for a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and left alone
fuller length delivery outside the off stump. He steers it to third man for a single
outside off and left alone
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and drives it to mid-off for a single
comes forward and turns it to the leg side for a single
comes forward and drives it back to bowler
comes forward and turns it to the leg side
defends it to the leg side for a single
comes forward and defends it to the off side
pushes it to leg side
outside the off stump and left alone
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Balbirnie defends it to the off side
comes forward and punches it to mid-on

that's the second wicket! Short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and coming in. The ball takes the inside edge. Taylor dives to his left and takes the catch. Zimbabwe bowling is coming to the party
defends it to the off side
drives it to long-off for a single
outside the off stump and looks to cut it away. The  ball beats the outside edge

and that's the third wicket! It hits the thigh pad and Joyce is looking for an opportunity to run a leg bye , but doesn't realise that Taylor has collected the ball. He just steps out of the crease and Taylor whups the bails off. Joyce doesn't even wait for third umpire's decision
pushes it to the leg side for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. He moves forward and drives it to sweeper cover for a couple
outside off and left alone
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
comes forward and punches it to cover
fuller and wider outside the off stump. Stirling throws his arms at it and gets a boundary through the point region
drives it to long-off for a single
defends it back onto the pitch
off the outside edge to short third-man
defends it to the off side
looks to defend it and is beaten
or is it Rankin? He gets bounce off the pitch with the first ball he bowls. Defends and the ball bobs up and falls down
defends it to cover
on the leg stump line. He turns it to midwicket for a single
steers into the third-man for a single
bounce again! He looks to cut and very nearly drags it onto his stumps.
off the arm to fine-leg for a leg-bye
comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single

it has to be the fielder's wicket! Short on the middle and leg. Niall is looking to pull and gets a top-edge. The ball looks to be in the gap between short fine-leg and square-leg. Muzarabani, at short fine-leg, takes a few strides forward and then moves sideways. When he realises that he can't get to the ball by running, he dives and catches the ball inches off the ground.
drives it to cover for a single
defends it to the off side
turns it to square-leg for a single

wide down the leg side
defends it to the leg side
gets an inside edge on the intended defensive stroke and it sails, luckily, over the stumps
steers it to third-man for a single
short ball outside the leg stump. Stirling pulls it to square-leg for a boundary. A hush descends upon the crowd
comes forward and defends it to the off side
cuts it to point

fuller ball on the leg stump. He paddles it to fine-leg for a boundary

and gets a wicket with the second ball! Good length ball outside the off stump. Kevin is playing for the angle but the ball turns after pitching and takes the outside edge. First slip moves to the left and takes the catch

short and wide outside the off stump. He lofts it over cover for a boundary. If not for the score tab, you would think, Ireland are 194/0  in 15 overs chasing 212  looking at the crowd reaction

wide outside the off stump. Left alone by Stirling

gets an inside edge onto the pads. Superb umpiring by Shaun George there. It was a faint inside edge

sweeps the good length ball on the leg stump to deep square-leg for a boundary
defends it to the off side

what a co-incidence! Zimbabwe and Ireland both have a run-out on 26.6 overs! Good length ball outside the off stump. Stirling defends it to the off side and sets off for what he deems to be a single. Wilson refuses but Stirling is close to Wilson then the stumps. So, it's obvious that Stirling would be struggling. He is couple of feet out. Ervine was out on 26.6 over for Zimbabwe
defends it to the leg side
turns it to the leg side for a single
defends it back to the bowler
drives it to cover
turns it to leg side for a single
good length ball on the middle stump. He is playing for the ripping leg break and misses. He knows as he has played it that he is plumb in front. Ireland slip deeper now
comes forward and defends it to the off side
comes forward and pushes it to cover
googly! He is beaten in flight and reads the googly off the pitch as he defends it to off side
sweeps it to fine-leg for a couple
defends it to cover
punches it to long-on for a single
glances it to short fine-leg for a single
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
punches it to cover
looks to defend the googly without knowing it was one and is beaten
slogs it to deep midwicket for a single
struck on the pads outside the off stump as he is looking to defend it

fuller ball on the middle and leg. He comes down the track and looks to go big over deep midwicket. The resultant leading edge goes to long-on where Williams cups his hands around the ball. Zimbabwe can harbour hopes of topping the table after the game
defends it to the off side
defends it back to the bowler
pushes it to the leg side for a single
drives it to point
comes down the track and defends it back onto the pitch
nine down! Fuller ball on the off stump. Rankin is going for the slog sweep. The ball comes in with the angle, beats the slog and hits the stumps! Ireland are going down without a fight
turns it to the leg side for a single
looks to flick it and gets a leading edge that falls short of mid-off
drives it to cover
defends it back onto the pitch
pitches outside the leg stump and hits him on the pad
turns it to deep square-leg for a couple
looks to turn it away and is beaten down the leg stump line
defends it to the leg side
turns it to short fine-leg for a single
slogs it to deep midwicket for a single
defends it to cover for a single
inside-edges a slog to short fine-leg for a single
beats the batsman with googly once again
Zimbabwe move to the top of the table. Fuller ball on the off stump. He comes down the track and lofts it deep midwicket where the catch is taken.
